summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 49th Avenue Northeast, from East 39th Street to East 38th Street, by constructing sewers and watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7834 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
